# Sfx Get
<!--
@name: Sfx Get
@description: 
@tags: 
@categories: 
\-->
<div class="compatibility"><span>Compatibility</span><img src="https://doc.aoz.studio/assets/images/common/compatibility/aoz_logo.png" valign="center" alt="AOZ" title="AOZ" /></div>

Return the value of one of the properties of a sound effect
## Parameters

- **index**: The index of the previously created sound effect
- **string**: A string containing the name of the parameter
- **any**: The string or the floating point value to set
---
<p align="center"><img valign="middle" width="76px" src="https://doc.aoz.studio/assets/images/en/image001.png" /></p>
